name: 不完全控制(NonFullControl)
description:
This is a simple minigame that used to be a testing project.
Inspiration was generated in several simple scenes, and since then, that space has taken on new meaning and I wants to share it.

Q: What kind of game is this?
A: This is a 3D, platform like jumping, level breaking game.

Q: What will you experience in the game?
A: In the game, players need to overcome numerous levels without fully controlling their own operations, and ultimately be led to the truth behind them.

Q: Where will the game's save be stored?
A: The game's archive will only exist locally.


Free Plan:


This game is planned to be converted to a free game after the actual sales volume is less than (unknown reasons) or equal to 1111. The mobile version will also eliminate advertising.



Self-rating: 5/10

—— Bilibili：危途异客
